name: Motocross Urban Fever
storyline: Motocross Urban Fever brings you to the urban racetrack, with large ramps, buildings everywhere, litter and debris in your way, and various other obstacles and features. In this game, you'll be racing against two other guys on motorbikes, who you race against depends on who you choose as your own racer. The three are Miniclip Fury (blue and gold), Flying Lizard (Green), and Flaming Skull (black and red). The choice is purely aesthetic, so you can go with whichever racer you prefer.
summary: Motocross Urban Fever is a 3d sports game developed by Miniclip and Silent Bay Studios that was currently unavailable to play. It features 9 stages, 3 types of races, 3 race tracks, numerous airborne stunts, and 3 racers for players to pick: Miniclip Fury, Green Lizard, and Flaming Skull. It is the second of the three Motocross Fever series of games after Motocross Fever.
